casebody.data:
Ervin A. GIBB, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 15162. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. Oct. 19, 1954. Ervin A. Gibb, in pro. per. Frank M. Johnson, Jr., U. S. Atty., M. Lewis Gwathney, Asst. U. S. Atty., Birmingham, Ala., Fred S. Weaver, Asst. U. S. Atty., Double Springs, Ala., for appellee.

Before BORAH, RIVES and TUTTLE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon the authority of Reed v. United States, 5 Cir., 142 F.2d 435 and Hamilton v. United States, 4 Cir., 204 F.2d 927, the judgment in the above styled case is affirmed.
